definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Amination process is the key procedure for Taurine production.
sentences.chinese: 氨化工段是牛磺酸生产的关键工序。

sentences.english: Ingredients like taurine, guarana , and inositol are natural substances.
sentences.chinese: 牛磺酸，瓜拉那和肌糖都是天然物质。

sentences.english: Aim To investigate the effect of taurine on the hypertensive rats with insulin resistance.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨牛磺酸对胰岛素抵抗高血压大鼠的影响。

sentences.english: The effect of taurine in this model was observed.
sentences.chinese: 观察牛磺酸对该模型的干预作用。

sentences.english: In greidine " Ingredients like taurine, guarana and inositol or are natural substances."
sentences.chinese: 这些成分像牛磺酸，巴西可可和纤维醇属于自然物质。

sentences.english: It showed that taurine could decrease the breaks of DNA injured by CdCl2.
sentences.chinese: 说明牛磺酸可以减少氯化镉引起的DNA断裂。

sentences.english: The content of taurine in taurine eye drops was determined by spectrophotometry.
sentences.chinese: 采用分光光度法测定牛磺酸滴眼液中牛磺酸的含量。

sentences.english: The content of taurine in taurine eye drops was determined by spectrophotometry.
sentences.chinese: 采用分光光度法测定牛磺酸滴眼液中牛磺酸的含量。

sentences.english: Taurine possesses protective activity against cadmium-induced DNA damage and hydroxy radical scavenging activity in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 牛磺酸在体外对氯化镉引起的DNA损伤有预防作用。

sentences.english: Objective To explore protective effects of taurine-zinc coordination compound(TZC)on nervous system impaired by depleted uranium.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨牛磺酸锌对贫铀致神经系统损伤的保护作用。

sentences.english: Ingrediants " Ingredients like torrintaurine, garama guarana and inositol are natural substances."
sentences.chinese: 原料中诸如牛磺酸，瓜拉拿和肌醇都是天然原料。

sentences.english: Demonstrating that kittens get taurine from the queen via the placenta.
sentences.chinese: 证明幼猫能够通过胎盘从母猫身体中吸收牛磺酸。

sentences.english: Eggs are, however, also a good source of taurine.
sentences.chinese: 然而鸡蛋也是富含牛磺酸的。

sentences.english: This paper presents a method for determining taurine by pre - column performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) in alkaline condition.
sentences.chinese: 提出柱前衍生高效液相色谱法测定饮料中的牛磺酸。

sentences.english: We consider taurine fortified milk has the role of promoting learning and memory of animal.
sentences.chinese: 牛磺酸强化牛乳有增加动物学习和记忆的作用。

sentences.english: An automatic potential titration method for the determination of taurine granules was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了自动电位滴定法测定牛磺酸颗粒含量。

definition: choline (amine related to vitamin B complex)
